description.en: The student can learn about the work of a clinical pharmacist in a hospital.
description.et: Üliõpilane saab tutvuda kliinilise proviisori tööga haiglas.

objectives.en: The goal of the internship is to consolidate the theoretical knowledge and practical skills acquired in the master's degree in clinical pharmacy in the hospital pharmacy.
objectives.et: Praktika eesmärgiks on kliinilise farmaatsia magistriõppes omandatud teoreetiliste teadmiste ja praktiliste oskuste kinnistamine haiglaapteegis.

learning_outcomes.en: * have an overview ofclinical pharmacist work at the hospital
learning_outcomes.et: * omavad ülevaadet kliinilise proviisori tööst haiglas

learning_outcomes.en: * able to advise medical staff and patients.
